entry.title: Menu Buttons: Account Manager
entry.heading: Account Manager
entry.para: The Account Manager button returns you to the main account management module.

entry.title: Set/install checkbox
entry.heading: Set Install checkbox
entry.para: Check this checkbox in order to set (or install) a vacation notice. That is, this tells the system you want to create a new vacation notice. If there is any existing vacation setup, it will be replaced.

entry.title: Unset/remove checkbox
entry.heading: Unset/remove checkbox
entry.para: Check this checkbox to remove your vacation setup. Removing the setup stops any further vacation notices from being sent.

entry.title: Message Composition
entry.heading: Message Composition
entry.para: There is a large message composition window in the middle for you to compose your vacation message. This is the message that will be sent to others. A sample message is there, which you can edit to your needs.

The vacation message may include email headers, and should include at least a Subject: header. It should NOT, however, contain a To: header as that will be generated automatically). If the string $SUBJECT appears in the message, it will be replaced with the original subject line of the oringal message when the reply is sent.

entry.title: Alias Address
entry.heading: Alias Address
entry.para: You may specify a single alias for yourself here. Normally, vacation will not respond to messages if your actual email address is not in the To: or the Cc: line. However, many people have multiple email addresses (alias) that deliver to the same mailbox. This field allows you to specify such an alias address for vacation respond to.
